mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course (COURSE_ID, USER_ID, COURSE_NAME, COURSE_AVG_SCORE, COURSE_NUMBER) VALUES (course_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{courseName}, 0, #{courseNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id AS courseId, c.user_id AS userId, c.course_name AS courseName, c.course_avg_score AS courseAvgScore, c.course_number AS courseNumber, LISTAGG(cp.place_id, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cp.place_id) AS courseIdList, LISTAGG(pl.place_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cp.place_id) AS courseList FROM Course c JOIN Course_place cp ON c.course_id = cp.course_id JOIN place pl ON cp.place_id = pl.place_id GROUP BY c.course_id, c.user_id, c.course_name, c.course_avg_score, c.course_number
SELECT course_id AS courseId, user_id AS userId, course_name AS courseName, course_avg_score AS courseAvgScore, course_number AS courseNumber FROM COURSE WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
